name: Puzzling Deltas
description:
In this Puzzle game, your mission is to destroy the Delta Spawners, who will keep shooting Deltas towards your Blue Base.

In order to achieve this, you control Reflectors that can change the direction of the Deltas and use them against the Delta Spawners.

Be careful! You may accidentaly guide them towards your Base.

Controls:

Left/Right Arrow Keys - Rotate the Reflectors.

Credits:

Developer: Valentin Moreno.
